processingCommand.script:
:SET &TZ# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.${TOP_PART}.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,TIME_ZONE,1)
:SET &PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.${TOP_PART}.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &INSTALL_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.${TOP_PART}.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,INSTALL_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &POSTCHECK_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.${TOP_PART}.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,POSTCHECK_SCRIPT_NAME,1)

:PUB &TZ#
:PUB &PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME#,,WORKFLOW
:PUB &INSTALL_SCRIPT_NAME#,,WORKFLOW
:PUB &POSTCHECK_SCRIPT_NAME#,,WORKFLOW


:SET &RUN_ID#      = SYS_ACT_PARENT_NR()
:SET &RUN_ID#      = FORMAT(&RUN_ID#)
!:PUBLISH &RUN_ID#,,WORKFLOW

! INC/CTASK
:SET &TICKET_TYPE# = ""

:IF &TICKET# = "null"
:  SET &TICKET# = ""
:  PUBLISH &TICKET#,,WORKFLOW
:ENDIF

:IF &TICKET# <> ""
:  SET &INC# = SUBSTR(&TICKET#,1,3)
:  SET &CTA# = SUBSTR(&TICKET#,1,5)
:  IF &INC# = "INC"
:    SET &TICKET_TYPE# = "INC"
:  ELSE
:    IF &CTA# = "CTASK"
:      SET &TICKET_TYPE# = "CTASK"
:    ELSE
:      PRINT "WARNING - No valid INC/CTASK!"
:      SET &TICKET_TYPE# = ""
:    ENDIF
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF
:PUBLISH &TICKET_TYPE#

! Get current time and date
:SET &TIME_NOW#  = SYS_TIME_PHYSICAL("HH:MM:SS","&TZ#")
:SET &DATE_NOW#  = SYS_DATE_PHYSICAL("YYYY-MM-DD","&TZ#")
:PUBLISH &TIME_NOW#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &DATE_NOW#,,WORKFLOW

:IF &MODULES# = ""
:  PRINT "ERROR - No modules selected!"
:  SET &STATUS# = CANCEL_UC_OBJECT(&RUN_ID#, "ENDED_CANCEL")
:ENDIF

:DEFINE &AMODULES#, string, 20
:FILL &AMODULES#[] = STR_SPLIT("&MODULES#", ",")
:SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&AMODULES#[])

:SET &WMS_INSTALL#       = "false"
:SET &RW_INSTALL#        = "false"
:SET &WMS_FAIL_INSTALL#  = "false"
:SET &RW_FAIL_INSTALL#   = "false"

:SET &REST_MODULES#      = ""

:SET &RUNVAR# = 1
:WHILE &RUNVAR# LE &LEN#
:  SWITCH "Y"
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "WMS"
:      SET &WMS_INSTALL# = "true"
:      SET &RET# = STR_MATCH(&REST_MODULES#, "*WMS*")
:      IF &RET# = "N"
:        SET &REST_MODULES# = STR_CAT(&REST_MODULES#, "WMS,")
:      ENDIF
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "RW"
:      SET &RW_INSTALL# = "true"
:      SET &RET# = STR_MATCH(&REST_MODULES#, "*RW*")
:      IF &RET# = "N"
:        SET &REST_MODULES# = STR_CAT(&REST_MODULES#, "RW,")
:      ENDIF
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "WMS-FAIL"
:      SET &WMS_FAIL_INSTALL# = "true"
:      SET &RET# = STR_MATCH(&REST_MODULES#, "*WMS*")
:      IF &RET# = "N"
:        SET &REST_MODULES# = STR_CAT(&REST_MODULES#, "WMS,")
:      ENDIF
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "RW-FAIL"
:      SET &RW_FAIL_INSTALL# = "true"
:      SET &RET# = STR_MATCH(&REST_MODULES#, "*RW*")
:      IF &RET# = "N"
:        SET &REST_MODULES# = STR_CAT(&REST_MODULES#, "RW,")
:      ENDIF
:  ENDSWITCH
:  SET &RUNVAR# = &RUNVAR# + 1
:ENDWHILE

:SET &LENGTH# = STR_LENGTH(&REST_MODULES#)
:SET &LE# = &LENGTH# - 1
:SET &REST_MODULES# = SUBSTR(&REST_MODULES#, 1, &LE#)
:PUBLISH &REST_MODULES#,,WORKFLOW

:PUBLISH &WMS_INSTALL#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_INSTALL#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_FAIL_INSTALL#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_FAIL_INSTALL#,,WORKFLOW

! Printers
:DEFINE &ATMPPRINTERS#, string, 400
:DEFINE &APRINTERS#, string, 400
:DEFINE &APPARAM#, string, 4

:FILL &ATMPPRINTERS#[] = STR_SPLIT("&PRINTERS#", ";")
:SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&ATMPPRINTERS#[])
:SET &COUNT# = 1

:WHILE &COUNT# LE &LEN#
:  IF &ATMPPRINTERS#[&COUNT#] <> ""
:    FILL &APPARAM#[] = STR_SPLIT(&ATMPPRINTERS#[&COUNT#], ",")
! 20231107 - RG - lets create always 'label' printer to have "Local Raw Printer" (original line commented)
!:    SET &APRINTERS#[&COUNT#] = "'&APPARAM#[1]' '&APPARAM#[2]' '&APPARAM#[3]' '&APPARAM#[4]'"
:    SET &APRINTERS#[&COUNT#] = "'&APPARAM#[1]' '&APPARAM#[2]' '&APPARAM#[3]' 'label'"

:IF &XPARAMS# <> ""
: SET &XPARAMS# = "&XPARAMS#,&APRINTERS#[&COUNT#]"
:ELSE
: SET &XPARAMS# = "&APRINTERS#[&COUNT#]"
:ENDIF

:  ENDIF
:  SET &COUNT# = &COUNT# + 1
:ENDWHILE

:PUB &XPARAMS#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &APRINTERS#[],,WORKFLOW

! Login
:SET &MODULE_LOGIN# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.INSTALL-PRINTERS.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "LOGIN", 1)
:PUBLISH &MODULE_LOGIN#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &NUMBER_ID# = ""
:PUBLISH &NUMBER_ID#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &CLOSE_NUMBER_ID# = ""
:PUBLISH &CLOSE_NUMBER_ID#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &CTASK_UPDATE_STATUS# = ""
:PUBLISH &CTASK_UPDATE_STATUS#,,WORKFLOW

! Event Assignment Group
:SET &EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP#  = GET_VAR(CONFIG.INSTALL-PRINTERS.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP_PROD", 1)
:SET &PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.INSTALL-PRINTERS.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE", 1)
:SET &JDA_REBUILD_IS_PROV# = "True"

! STRY0029851 - configuration item is not defined value then it is nonproduction and will be assigned LATAM L2
:IF &CONFIGURATION_ITEM# <> GET_VAR(CONFIG.INSTALL-PRINTERS.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "TEST_NOT_CONFIGURATION_ITEM", 1)
:  SET &EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP#  = GET_VAR(CONFIG.INSTALL-PRINTERS.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP", 1)
:  SET &PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE# = ""
:  SET &JDA_REBUILD_IS_PROV# = "False"
:  SET &RUNVAR# = &LEN#
:ENDIF

:PUBLISH &EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &JDA_REBUILD_IS_PROV#,,WORKFLOW

! Incident Site Update
:SET &INC_SITE_UPDATE# = "false"
:PUBLISH &INC_SITE_UPDATE#,,WORKFLOW
